name: mysql-mcp
description: MCP server for MySQL database interactions with enhanced security and scalability
author: Ahmed Mustufa Malik

tools.name: execute_query
tools.description: Execute SQL queries with built-in safety validation and injection protection

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: List all base tables in the current database with schema information

tools.name: describe_table
tools.description: Get detailed schema information for a specific table including columns, types, and constraints

tools.name: get_table_data
tools.description: Retrieve sample data from a table with configurable row limits

tools.name: primary_keys
tools.description: Get primary key column(s) for a specific table

tools.name: search_columns
tools.description: Find columns whose names match a pattern (case-insensitive) across all tables

tools.name: foreign_keys
tools.description: List foreign key relationships referencing or referenced by a table

tools.name: introspect_schema
tools.description: Return a comprehensive JSON map of the entire database schema
